name: Dark Salsa
description:
The game takes place in the world of an unfinished game. Enjoy specific game development narrative and "broken" game mechanics. Dedicated to everyone who has ever created games.

Created for the Epic Mega Jam 2020 in one week by one person.

Instructions:
WASD - Movement;
LMB - Attack;
Space - Jump;
ESC or P - Pause game or close info message.

Content.
Animations:
https://www.mixamo.com/#/?page=1&query=Magic (Idle, Walk, Run, Attack);
https://www.mixamo.com/#/?page=1&query=Sword+and+shield (Idle, Walk, Run, Attack);
https://www.mixamo.com/#/?page=1&query=Zombie (Idle, Walk, Run, Attack).

Weapons and some props:
https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/e4494c76c3b348aba7ef9b263...

Free icons:
https://www.flaticon.com/packs/fitness-29?k=1607539094281

All other content is original. All meshes created by UE4 instruments. Main menu image inspired by Dark Souls.
